item.title: AngstromCTF 2019 Secret Sheep Society Crypto 120 Writeup
item.author: admin@omega-coder.me (omega_coder)
item.description: TL;DR Spotting the weakness (AES with CBC Mode). Get token Flipping specific bytes in session json (turn flase to true). manipulate token with flipped bytes. Send manipulated token to page. Get the flag. Challenge details Category Points Solves Crypto 120 0 Challenge Description The sheep are up to no good. They have a web portal for their secret society, which we have the source for.
